item.description:
Hello Salsa Fans:

From Teddy's Shoes director: "Ever wonder what you should wear when you go out salsa dancing? If you are like me, you always want to look your best on the dance floor. Please join me at this great fashion show event held by Teddy's Shoes from Cambridge at the Mojito's Lounge."

Event Details:

-Spectacular Performances by : "Divinity Dance Studio", "Paper Moon Dance Studio, "Salsa & Control", "Singer Alex Deras"

-Modeling of Dance Apparel & Shoes

-Famous Brands

-Complimentary Goodie Bags with Reservation in Advance (Requires: Name, Phone#, Email). Please contact the assistant organizer Angel with this information after you RSVP.

-Special Surprise

-Raffle tickets

**Beginner Salsa Lessons with Teacher Mariale from 9:00pm to 10pm

If you want a sneak peak of what you might see at the fashion show, please visit:

http://www.teddyshoes...

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa Fashion Show next month @ Mojito's Lounge
